title: Social media 'geopolitical battleground', says Andrews
snippet: Irish MEP Barry Andrews has warned that social media has "become a geopolitical battleground".

title: Barry Andrews MEP - European Parliament | LinkedIn
snippet: Barry Andrews is a second-term MEP for Fianna Fáil representing Dublin, Ireland… · see more · By clicking Continue to join or sign in, you agree to LinkedIn’s User Agreement, Privacy Policy, and Cookie Policy.

title: Barry Andrews MEP For Dublin – Fianna Fáil Party Member
snippet: Some of the issues tackled by Barry Andrews in his role as an MEP are housing, crime and anti-social behaviour, the cost of living crisis, health, education, immigration and the challenges posed by climate change.

title: Ireland and Europe must prepare for post-war Ukraine, says Andrews
snippet: Fianna Fáil MEP Barry Andrews has said that Ireland and Europe should prepare for the realities of a post-war Ukraine, saying that Ukraine should be allowed into the EU once their corruption issues are tackled

title: Andrews welcomes €3 levy on fast fashion packages
snippet: Fianna Fáil MEP Barry Andrews has welcomed an EU decision to introduce a €3 customs duty per item on "fast fashion" parcels, starting in July 2026
